tasks.question: When was the last time you splashed out on a new console or a Collector's Edition? What did you buy?
How much did you fork out on in-game skins or Battle Passes last month?
Have you ever felt like a game studio ripped you off with a buggy release? What happened?
Do you find it hard to save up for a new GPU? Are you saving up for any upcoming releases at the moment?
Have you ever lent a friend some in-game currency or a physical disk and they haven't paid you back?
When buying a pro gaming chair, do you usually pay in full, or put down a deposit and pay it off slowly?
When was the last time you and your friends chipped in to buy a private server or a gift for a teammate?
What sites or stores do you normally shop around for when looking for the best game discounts?
What are some ways to avoid running up debts on your parents' credit card with microtransactions?
Are you trying to cut back on buying too many indie games on Steam sales at the moment?
